document.full_text: sac capital advisors lp faces an insider trading probe from the u.s. securities and exchange commission related to the $15 billion takeover of biotechnology firm medimmune inc, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
document.title: sac faces insider trading probe on medimmune: report
